article: We were going to play a team from a country school. They didn't come _ the game time arrived .They looked  _   than we had thought. They were wearing dirty blue jeans   and looked like farm boys. We even thought that they had never seen a basketball before. We all sat down. We felt that we didn't _  any practice against a team like that. It was already  _ late that no time could be given to them for a warm up. The game began. One of our boys _ the ball and he shot   a long pass to our forward  .From out of nowhere a boy in a dirty T-shirt _ he pass and with a beautiful form   he shot and got two points  .They surprised us. Then they got  another pair of points in a minute. Soon it was all over. The country team  _ us. We certainly learned that even though a team is good,there is usually another just a little better. But the important lesson learned was: One can't tell a man or a team, by the _  .
